attributes.action: Keep his promise of British Jobs for British Workers!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the Pembrokeshire Power Station is about to be built, and to date no British workers have been taken on to work there.  Currently we understand that only 40 Polish workers have been taken on to work night shifts.  While this petition understands the need for economic migration in certain circumstances, in this situation there are more than enough British workers to be employed on the site.  We urge the Prime Minister to honour his promise of giving British jobs to British workmen and women.
